1077590.name: Esothe
1077590.description:
Esothe tells the story of a lone wanderer journeying across a vast, forgotten plateau — a land isolated from the rest of the world by an enormous wall. What first appears to be an abandoned yet peaceful place slowly reveals its story, piece by piece, as the explorer uncovers the truth buried beneath its silence.

  • Exploration - An open world with dozens of locations to explore, full of secrets and connected underground ruins,

  • Platforming - Navigate crumbling dungeons and ancient structures where agility and precision are key - traverse environments shaped by time and decay.

  • Story - The plateau has a dark past. Statues of winged beings, that can be found at every step, skeletons of giants in dungeons, traces of siege. All this will fold into a complex story over time,

  • Puzzles - The land is scattered with intricate magical mechanisms - remnants of the lost technology once powered by unknown energies. Some remain dormant, and it’s up to the wanderer to awaken them and uncover their purpose.

    Esothe takes place in the same universe as Venineth game.
